document.full_text: three people died and hundreds were injured on saturday in some of the fiercest clashes between police and anti-government protesters since popular unrest started to batter faction-riven yemen in january.
document.title: escalating yemen violence kills three, injures hundreds
lines_and_colors: three people died and hundreds were injured on saturday in some of the fiercest clashes between police and anti-government protesters since popular unrest started to batter faction-riven yemen in january.
